news.title: Daniel Lopatin Details New Marty Supreme Soundtrack Album
news.summary: The A24 film and album both arrive on Christmas Day

news.title: Jamie xx Remixes Robyn’s “Dopamine”: Listen
news.summary: Robyn’s comeback single snags the first Jamie xx remix in three years

news.title: Wet Leg Share Surreal “Pokemon” Video: Watch
news.summary: Alice Longyu Gao bonds with a giant egg in the Moisturizer single’s video, directed by Faux Real’s Elliott Arndt

news.title: Prostitute Sign to Mute, Announce 2026 European Tour
news.summary: Plus, their debut album, Attempted Martyr, is getting a vinyl reissue

news.title: Xiu Xiu Cover Daniel Johnston, Glorilla, Robyn, and More on New Album

news.title: Voxtrot Announce Tour and First Album Since 2007, Share New Video: Watch
news.summary: The Austin, Texas, indie-rock band returns, in February, with Dreamers in Exile

news.title: Drive-By Truckers and Jason Isbell Reunite to Play “Hell No, I Ain’t Happy” on Colbert: Watch
news.summary: Marking one of very few appearances Isbell has made with the Southern rock band since departing in 2007

news.title: Autechre Announce 2026 European Tour
news.summary: The TwentyTwentySix live tour includes the duo’s biggest-ever headline date
